control_attributes.control_description: The information system detects network services that have not been authorized or approved by [Assignment: organization-defined authorization or approval processes] and [Selection (one or more): audits; alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles]].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system discovers, collects, distributes, and uses indicators of compromise.
